snippet: Two exhibitions, one at the Center for Jewish History and one at the Museum of Jewish Heritage, focus on ritual and household Judaica from the Persian Gulf.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; exhibits Light and Shadows: The Story of Iranian Jews, at Center for Jewish History, and Discovery and Recovery: Preserving Iraqi Jewish Heritage, at Museum of Jewish Heritage, both feature ritual and household objects from Sephardic Jews who fled Muslim countries; several other institutions are archiving such artifacts and planning exhibits.
lead_paragraph: Two exhibitions, one at the Center for Jewish History and one at the Museum of Jewish Heritage, focus on ritual and household Judaica from the Persian Gulf.

headline.main: Centuries of Judaica From Life and Rites in Muslim Lands
headline.print_headline: Centuries of Judaica From Muslim Lands in Middle East
